name: Remotely Piloted Aircraft Technology - ADDA
aliases: RPAT - African Drone and Data Academy
description: RPAT is a 1 - 2 week self enrolment, self paced, online course that introduces students to aerodynamics, drone-design, and drone flight operations.

SDGs.evidenceText: Drone technaology and enabled services are used in agriculture
Drone technaology and enabled services are used to transport medicines to hard to reach places
RPAT is an online course available to youth wanting to learn about drone tech
SKills acquired through the overall content of ADDA help students place into jobs
Drone tech is used for data acquisition for urban planning.
Drone tech used for mapping towards resilience, as well as forest cover monitoring.
